creditline: Gift of Ruth H. and David M. Waterbury in memory of Marjorie P.L. Monkhouse
description: central, irregularly-shaped wood form, with fissures and holes, incised with arcs and crosshatched areas; seven light-colored pegs and three dark pieces of molding attached to central form; arced and straight pieces of molding extend out from central form; wall hanging
